title: Health, Safety & Environment
description: Jerash's commitment to safety excellence and HSE standards

hero.title: Health, Safety & Environment
hero.subtitle: HSE is a fundamental element of all of our business activities

intro.paragraph1: Jerash recognizes that an essential factor in its business success is the emphasis it places on Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE).
intro.paragraph2: HSE is a fundamental element of all of our business activities. This commitment is an integral part of the service delivery workflows encompassing the organization from the lowest levels to the highest, including all contractors.
intro.paragraph3: The leadership teams have full responsibility, and accountability to drive this culture by ensuring effective implementation of our standards.
intro.paragraph4: In addition, we must comply to legal, international, national, customer and other applicable standards and requirements whichever are more stringent. Our ultimate aim is for Jerash to be recognized wherever we operate as the leader in HSE.

commitments.sectionTitle: We will demonstrate our commitment by
commitments.1: Setting measurable HSE objectives as part of our business performance and monitoring them for continuous improvement
commitments.2: Driving HSE behavior with a no defect mindset and rewarding outstanding HSE performance and initiatives
commitments.3: Eliminating undesirable HSE events and accidents with a strong reporting culture and effective investigation of near-misses
commitments.4: Training our workforce and contractors on our HSE standards to prevent losses
commitments.5: Effectively communicating our HSE policies, standards, programs and performance
commitments.6: Protecting the health, safety and security of our people and contractors at all times
commitments.7: Meeting legal, international, national, customer and other applicable standards and requirements
commitments.8: Protecting the environment through spill prevention, reduction of natural resource consumption and emissions, and the reduction and recycling of waste
commitments.9: Ensuring HSE is considered while designing, engineering and deploying our services and products
commitments.10: Maintaining an updated response plan to minimize the effect of any business disruption or crisis

policy.title: Policy Compliance
policy.text: Every Jerash employee and contractor is accountable to ensure compliance with this policy. We will update this policy regularly to ensure that it still reflects our strong commitment and focus on HSE.
